programme.title: A Country Wedding
programme.desc: Sparks fly when an engaged country-music star (Jesse Metcalfe) reconnects with a childhood friend (Autumn Reeser).

programme.desc: The women try to help a neighborhood couple, George and Renee Corliss, patch up their faltering marriage.

programme.desc: Blanche announces that she is canceling a date with her latest boyfriend, because he does not meet her standards.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy dismays when her daughter is too forgiving of her unfaithful husband.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: When two police officers set up surveillance equipment in Blanche's house, Dorothy, Rose, Blanche and Sophia are more interested in snaring the policemen.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Through a series of flashbacks, the housemates reminisce about their birthday celebrations.

programme.desc: When Reba enters a beauty pageant for grandmothers, Barbra Jean becomes jealous and sets out to prove she is the true Grandma Hart.

programme.desc: Reba is thrilled when the city's hottest real estate agent wants to interview her for a job, until the woman shows up unannounced for a surprise meeting.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Kyra passes her driving test, Barbra Jean makes her sign a safety contract and provides her with a cell phone that contains a hidden GPS chip.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock volunteers to be a football coach and encourages Jake to try out for the team, so Reba persuades Van to train him for the tryouts.

programme.desc: A sick Frasier begs Niles to be the substitute host of his radio program.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: While sitting at the Cafe Nervosa, Frasier and Niles discuss the past year in Seattle.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier is furious when a Boston bar buddy (John O'Hurley) turns Frasier's first time with a woman into a novella.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin objects when Frasier demands that Eddie be neutered after fathering a litter of puppies.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam dispatches Carla to get revenge on John Allen Hill; on horseback, Cliff suffers from pony distress.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Henri (Anthony Cistaro) upsets Woody's apple cart by proposing to Kelly (Jackie Swanson); Frasier turns to the Orient for pain relief.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Against her better judgment, Reba gives in to Cheyenne's pleas and hires the unemployed Van as her assistant, only to be surprised when he sells the house she has been trying to unload for weeks.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba takes it upon herself to keep Van sober when she suspects he has a drinking problem; Kyra and her band are invited to perform at a USO event for soldiers leaving for Iraq.

programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van must run interference at a client party after Reba takes a pill, by mistake, that will make her violently ill if she drinks alcohol.

programme.desc: When Barbra Jean signs Reba up for an online dating service, Reba winds up dating a mystery man and spending less time with the family.

programme.desc: The housemates recall some of their absurd moneymaking schemes.

programme.desc: The housemates could earn $100,000 if they adopt an elderly pig.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Courtesy of their new housekeeper's magic potions, Blanche's social life perks up and Dorothy wins the battle against insomnia.

programme.title: Eat, Play, Love
programme.desc: Veterinarian Dr. Carly Monroe secretly loves Dan, the owner of a dog shelter. Unfortunately, Dan is about to marry his glamorous girlfriend and move to New York.

programme.title: Harvest Love
programme.desc: A widowed surgeon visits her family's pear orchard in hopes of taking a break from her hectic life and reconnecting with her distant son. Once there, she begins to fall for the farm manager, Will, who is growing a new hybrid pear.

programme.title: A Dash of Love
programme.desc: When an aspiring chef lands a dream job at her idol's restaurant, she befriends the handsome executive chef. After they are wrongly fired, the duo open their own eatery to prove their food is better.

programme.title: Love's Greek to Me
programme.desc: Ilana travels to the island of Santorini with her Greek boyfriend, Mike, for a family wedding. When he surprises her by proposing, she gets caught up in the whirlwind of his overzealous mom.

programme.title: A Very Venice Romance
programme.desc: Amy travels to Venice, Italy, to lure chef Marcello into helping her company's new venture. When Marcello declines, she signs up for his advanced cooking course to make her case.

programme.title: To Barcelona, Forever
programme.desc: As Anna travels back to Barcelona, reuniting with Erica to celebrate her engagement to Nico, she meets a charming farmer and accidentally finds herself engaged to save his family's legacy. Stars Ashley Williams, Alison Sweeney.

programme.desc: The women confront their phobias on a flight to the Bahamas to attend a funeral.

programme.desc: Frasier invites the new station manager (Eric Lutes) home for dinner and a date with Daphne, but Frasier is unaware that the man is gay.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles (David Hyde Pierce) considers parenthood after helping Frasier and Martin (Kelsey Grammer, John Mahoney) deliver a baby.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: When Martin asks his sons Frasier and Niles to accompany him to the closing of his favorite bar, it is only when they arrive there that Frasier and Niles realize they have shares in the company forcing the bar to close.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier's advice to a depressed listener prompts a deluge of criticism.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Rebecca urges Sam to see a fertility specialist; Frasier faces his own mortality.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam and Rebecca ponder what having a baby will be like; Norm and Cliff get cabin fever.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba teams up with Van to invest in real estate, he buys an uninspected house, which prompts her to want out of their partnership.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne asks Reba to talk some sense into Van when he stops going to church, but when Reba's efforts fail, she takes her problem straight to the church's handsome new minister (Patrick Fabian).

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is disappointed when her plans for Halloween fall through because everyone in the family has other plans.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Realizing that his wife has gained quite a bit of weight, Brock consults Reba on how best to handle the delicate situation.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose, concerned about the nuclear arms race, mails letters to President Reagan and Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A political candidate announces that he had an affair with Blanche, a contention that she denies.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy makes her ex-husband, Stanley Zbornak, jealous when she has an affair with his brother Theodore.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose's cousin, Sven Lindstrom, arrives from Sweden and falls in love with Blanche.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Shari's Second Act
programme.desc: Shari just moved back to D.C. after a breakup and hopes to start painting again. Inspiration hits when she meets Evan, a repairman who winds up actually being a gallery owner.

programme.title: North to Home
programme.desc: The McBride sisters reunite in Alaska for a memorable birthday celebration that connects their past to the present.

programme.title: Bottled With Love
programme.desc: After being stood up on a date, a woman writes down her feelings, places the letter in a bottle, and throws it into the ocean. Months later, a fisherman discovers the message and decides to reach out.

programme.title: My Secret Valentine
programme.desc: A young woman takes advice from the chalkboard notes that her mysterious tenant leaves when a slick sales rep arrives with plans to buy her family's prized winery.

programme.title: Love & Jane
programme.desc: Lilly, a hopeless romantic and literary enthusiast, gets the surprise of a lifetime when her favorite author, Jane Austen, comes into her life.

programme.title: Reality Bites: A Hannah Swensen Mystery
programme.desc: Hannah's favorite reality show takes over "The Cookie Jar." When the producer is found dead, Hannah and Norman team up to track down the killer. Chad invites Hannah to court.
